name: errbit
description: The open source error catcher that's Airbrake API compliant

MONGODB_URI.description: The connection URI to your MongoDB Cluster. If you don't have one, you can create a free plan at https://cloud.mongodb.com . Follow the Heroky deployment docs on the Errbit repo for more information on obtaining this string.

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Have Heroku export the current app name for review apps, see https://devcenter.heroku.com/articles/github-integration-review-apps#heroku_app_name-and-heroku_parent_app_name
